meanings.definition: Beliefs or teachings about the end of the world.
meanings.sent1: Many ancient cultures had apocalypticisms that predicted the world's end.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often analyze different apocalypticisms to understand historical perspectives.

meanings.sent2: Libraries often have sections dedicated to apocalypticisms for interested readers.
meanings.sent3: The professor's class on apocalypticisms was both enlightening and entertaining.
